title: I really need someone from Riot to help me
body: Recently, my younger sister has join LoL, and she is completely addict to it. Which is not a bad thing. A bad thing is she is only 14 and still got school. She is playing way too late + my mother need to sleep for early work in the morning. I do not want this to happen. I tried to block the internet but then she complaint to my mother and my mother asked me to unblock it for her and I cannot simply resist that. May I ask a selfish request to block her account for a month? It's not really a big deal as she can create a new account. But in my opinion, as a fresh start player she wouldn't want to abandon her account just yet and would wait for a few days. I can then see what I can do within the house to restrict her play time. If you can, please tell me then I can privately send the account name to the actual GM. Thank you very much. And by the way, please comment below for a suggestion on what should I do guys. Cheers

replies.body: isn't that your parents job? why are you acting like her dad?
Since we don't have a dad... and my mom is too soft...
ok i understand now man, sry for my comment it was silly
This will never happen. I could claim you are my sister and to shut down your account for a month. Do you see how this will not work?
I know your point from the start but I'd like to give it a try anyway

>  I tried to block the internet but then she complaint 


What do u mean by this??

Because if shes on a separate computer just block league by denying access through the firewall
Now she figure out how to use the cable...
